meanings.definition: A person who appears in a crowd scene in a film or play.
meanings.sent1: In the movie, the figurants added realism to the busy street scene.
meanings.sent2: The figurants filled the background of the stage during the play.
meanings.sent3: The figurants in the film accidentally bumped into each other, creating a funny moment.
meanings.sent4: As figurants in the play of life, we play our parts without stealing the spotlight.
meanings.sent5: The figurants in the movie wore colorful costumes to stand out in the crowd scene.

meanings.definition: A participant in a dance or ballet who does not have a solo role.
meanings.sent1: During the ballet performance, the figurants gracefully moved across the stage.
meanings.sent2: The figurants in the dance routine added depth to the choreography.
meanings.sent3: One of the figurants in the ballet tripped over their own feet, causing a moment of laughter.
meanings.sent4: The figurants in the dance symbolized the supporting roles we play in life's grand performance.
meanings.sent5: The figurants wore matching outfits to blend in with the main dancers on stage.
